query: What are the historical interactions of user 91? Take them and then recommend some movies to user 2 based on them.

tool_plan.note: To get the 20 most recent historical interactions of user 91.
To get a personalized ranking of movies for user 2 based on the historical interactions of user 91.
To get useful information to list the recommended items. 'title', 'genres', and 'description' should be retrieved.

arguments.items: <Python list of item IDs returned by the get_interacted_items_tool>
<Python list of item IDs returned by the get_top_k_recommendations_tool>
